thread.section_title: BIOVEA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIOVEA | biovea.com
thread.title: Erick Perez

author: Erick Perez
title: Erick Perez
text:
It arrived 3 weeks after purchasing and once I open the box I found that the security seal attached to the bottles were broken, also that the caps were poorly made which allowed the product to spilled over. Some of the bottles were half empty! Biovea sent me a faulty product. I think they knew it was faulty and still decided to send it to me.
Update: Before posting this review I waited to give it a chance for biovea to correct the mistake and they did. They took full responsibility and the customer service was same or better than googles customer service. I would re order again since I have the guarantee that biovea will do whats right and stand by the customer side. I do honestly hope they do a better quality control next time.
